MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the CW12 postcode area of Congleton, affecting properties in Astbury and surrounding areas.  We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 7.55AM.  In order to complete repairs to our overhead line safely, engineers on site need to isolate the power to other properties at 11AM and we expect the power to be restored by 1PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 09:48AM on 2nd February 2021
